import React,{useState} from 'react' import './Product.styles.css' const Product = ({id,title,description,rating,price,category,image}) =>{ const [less,SetLess] = useState(true) const showless = less ? description.slice(0,103) : description const setdescription = () =>{ SetLess(!less) } return(

{category} - {rating.rate}‚≠ê

{title} from $ {price} onwards

{showless}

{less ? "Read More" : "Show Less"}
) } export default Product
